statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE payment_terms = 'Net 30' AND contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name <> 'Company A' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_details;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address, payment_terms FROM supplier_details WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number, email_address FROM supplier_details ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM procurement_history WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM supplier_details JOIN procurement_history ON supplier_details.supplier_id = procurement_history.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_details;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email_address FROM supplier_details WHERE payment_terms = 'Net 30';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM supplier_details ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, procurement_date, product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM procurement_history WHERE supplier_id = '6ba7b8109dad11d180b400c04fd430c8' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY procurement_date ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, payment_terms, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM supplier_details JOIN procurement_history ON supplier_details.supplier_id = procurement_history.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, payment_terms HAVING num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM supplier_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM supplier_info INNER JOIN procurement_logs ON supplier_info.id = procurement_logs.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM supplier_info;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email, phone_number FROM supplier_info WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, price FROM product_catalog INNER JOIN supplier_info ON product_catalog.supplier_id = supplier_info.id;
SELECT requisition_number, order_date, delivery_date FROM procurement_logs WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, supplier_id, product_id, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT supplier_name, payment_date, amount_paid FROM suppliers s JOIN payments p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, payment_terms FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity_ordered, product_id FROM orders WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_paid FROM payments GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_paid > 5000;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT orders.id, products.name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT p.name, s.name AS supplier_name, o.quantity FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.id JOIN orders o ON p.id = o.product_id;
SELECT a.city, a.state, o.order_date, p.price FROM addresses a JOIN orders o ON o.id = a.id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id;
SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, SUM(p.price * o.quantity) AS total_payment FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.id = p.supplier_id JOIN orders o ON p.id = o.product_id GROUP BY s.name;
